channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: It’s not just about cholesterol. 1 in 5 have high levels of this artery-clogging substance that can lead to heart disease
item.description: It’s not only cholesterol that’s worrisome: Elevated levels of lipoprotein(a) increase your risk of heart attack and stroke.

item.title: AMC and Cinemark rode ‘incredible’ Black Friday box office surge, research finds
Luigi Mangione was found with a 3D-printed ‘ghost gun’ as authorities and the Supreme Court rush to regulate the untraceable weapons anyone can make
item.description: Ghost guns have increasingly turned up at crime scenes around the U.S. in recent years.

item.title: Forget ‘Dogs of the Dow.’ Here is a better strategy for picking dividend stocks.
Traders are pretty sure of a Fed rate cut. What if inflation data is too hot?
Why American Airlines is ‘closer to a have than a have-not’
Dow slips at open after Monday's selloff
End of Trump tax cuts would see 62% pay more—how Congress may respond
item.description: From lower federal rates to the cap on state and local property tax deductions, there is much at stake.

item.title: Pitching investors is like the NFL draft says Colin Kaepernick—’it only takes one’
item.description: At Fortune’s Brainstorm AI conference, the former 49ers quarterback said that startup founders will often hear “no”—but need to keep looking for the i...

item.title: Elon and Vivek have ‘talked about having a naughty list and a nice list for members of Congress’
item.description: Musk and entrepreneur Vivek Ramaswamy delivered a warning to Republicans who don't go along with their plans to slash spending.
